title: Why Investing in EliseAI is More Cost-Effective Than You Think
author: Arianna Paranzino
summary: This article discusses the cost-effectiveness of investing in EliseAI, highlighting its advanced technology and the significant ROI it offers compared to traditional point solutions.
main_content:
# Why Investing in EliseAI is More Cost-Effective Than You Think

In an industry where every dollar counts, it's natural to evaluate the cost of new technology carefully. At first glance, EliseAI may seem more expensive than other AI solutions on the market. However, our pricing reflects the advanced, highly customizable, and human-like AI experience we provide—one that goes beyond simple automation to deliver measurable business impact.

## The True Cost of Piecing Together Point Solutions

Many property management teams try to solve operational inefficiencies by layering multiple point solutions. They invest in separate tools for mass texting, chatbots, email communications, and call centers. However, this approach quickly becomes cost-prohibitive and inefficient for teams.

Take [Juniper Investment Group](https://www.eliseai.com/resources/juniper-investment-group), for example. Before EliseAI, they were using three separate platforms for resident communication: a mass texting service, a first-response chatbot, and a call answering service. By consolidating these solutions into EliseAI, they reduced their technology spend by $1 per unit per month, while improving response times and automation efficiency.

By eliminating four separate solutions—an answering service, multimedia messaging software, experience management platform, and VoIP provider—the [Scion Group](https://www.eliseai.com/resources/how-the-scion-group-reinvented-their-leasing-process-with-conversational-ai) saved over **$500,000 per year**. 

Rather than paying for multiple disconnected tools, EliseAI streamlines leasing, renewals, maintenance, and delinquencies—all in [one AI-powered platform](https://www.eliseai.com/gated-reducing-tech-stack).

![Streamlined Solutions](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cc1eef179b05d927065991/67d1c41607a0195084c66631_Blog-Image3-Final.png)

## Seamless Integration & Continuous Innovation

Since 2017, [EliseAI has raised $140M in funding](https://www.eliseai.com/blog/eliseai-world-leader-in-ai-enabled-solutions-for-housing-raises-75-million-series-d-round-valuing-company-in-excess-of-1-billion) to deliver best-in-class AI solutions tailored specifically for housing. Our advanced platform addresses persistent industry challenges by streamlining workflows, empowering operators, and consolidating essential AI functionalities into a single centralized solution. Developed in close collaboration with housing operators, our technology eliminates complexity, integrates with most property management systems (PMS) and customer management systems (CMS), and enables property teams to focus on delivering exceptional service.

EliseAI supports communication across text, email, phone, and web chat, providing seamless accessibility with written interactions available in 51 languages and voice capabilities in 7 languages.

Additionally, EliseAI customizes communications to meet the unique requirements of various asset types, including conventional housing, student housing, affordable communities, lease-ups, and single-family rentals.

![Integration and Innovation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cc1eef179b05d927065991/67d1c4055b13de8f6d3de8d6_Blog-Image2-Final.png)

## ROI That Speaks for Itself

Cost is only one part of the equation—return on investment is what truly matters. EliseAI customers typically see a **5-10x ROI**, a number that initially seems high but is backed by real data.

EliseAI's partnership with [The Scion Group](https://www.eliseai.com/resources/how-the-scion-group-reinvented-their-leasing-process-with-conversational-ai) resulted in approximately $1.3M in cost savings by replacing their call center operations with VoiceAI, streamlining communications, and significantly improving operational efficiency.

By implementing EliseAI’s conversational AI, [Juniper Investment Group](https://www.eliseai.com/resources/juniper-investment-group) improved leasing, collections, and maintenance operations, delivering ~$15 per unit/month ROI and convincing leadership to fully embrace automation-driven property management.

To help you evaluate the impact for your business, we conduct a personalized ROI analysis. This analysis details:
- The cost savings from reducing inefficiencies and consolidating technology
- The revenue increase from improved lead capture and higher conversion rates
- The time saved for your team, allowing them to focus on higher-value tasks

![Cost Savings and ROI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cc1eef179b05d927065991/67d1c426f23c66665ea5e1eb_Blog-Image4-Final.png)

## A World-Class Customer Success Team to Maximize Your ROI

Investing in technology is about more than just the product—it’s about the partnership and support that come with it. At EliseAI, our [Customer Success Team (CSM)](https://www.eliseai.com/blog/how-the-eliseai-customer-success-team-elevates-client-operations) ensures you get the most value out of your investment, helping you implement, optimize, and scale EliseAI effortlessly.

Unlike other software providers that leave you to figure things out on your own, our CSM team is with you every step of the way:

**Seamless Onboarding & Training** – We handle the heavy lifting, ensuring your team is fully trained and EliseAI is set up for success from day one.

**Proactive Optimization & Strategy** – Our team continuously monitors performance, fine-tunes automation settings, and provides data-driven insights to maximize efficiency and ROI.

**Fast, Responsive Support** – EliseAI’s CSMs are known for their speed and attentiveness—no ticket queues or long wait times. If you need assistance, we’re available for a same-day call to address your needs quickly.

![Customer Support](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cc1eef179b05d927065991/67d1c426f23c66665ea5e1eb_Blog-Image4-Final.png)

## Flexibility to Fit Your Needs

We understand that every property management company is different. Whether you’re looking to transform leasing, optimize resident communication, or automate maintenance coordination, EliseAI adapts to your specific needs.

The best investments aren’t just about cost—they’re about value. EliseAI doesn’t just replace human work; it enhances it, making teams more efficient, residents more satisfied, and businesses more profitable.

If price is your primary concern, let’s talk. We’ll run an ROI analysis tailored to your portfolio and show you exactly how EliseAI pays for itself—and then some.
